name: Christmas Mission
description: Mission Christmas is the story of how one small but very brave elf tried to collect the lost candy. This game is a hardcore 2D platformer with elements of survival.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win XP SP3 / Vista / Windows 7 / Windows 8 Processor: 1.2 Ghz+ Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 500MB DirectX: Version 7.0 Storage: 350 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 400 MB available space
